籤詩版本二:
Icing a kan cake ya fi launi, kuma sa'a yana kawo sa'a da sa'a.
Kada mutanen lokacin su yi nadama cewa sun yi suna a ƙarshen rayuwa kuma sun shahara a duk faɗin duniya a lokaci guda.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram shine icing akan kek.
Sa'a a cikin komai.
解曰: Tsohon ya zama sabon. Jirgin zuwa kayan da aka gama. Don haka burin rayuwarsa. Komai kaddara ce.
籤詩故事一:
◇Liang Haodengke
Masanin Liang Hao (963-1004), mai suna Taisu, an haife shi a Xucheng, Yunzhou (yanzu Dongping, Shandong) a cikin daular Song.
A lokacin mulkin Yongxi ya ci jarrabawar Jinshi yana dan shekara sha takwas. Ci gaba da neman jarabawar ya ci tura.
Ya fara cin jarrabawar ne a shekara ta uku ta Tianfu, ya ci jarrabawar a duk shekara ta hanyar daular Han ta baya da ta Zhou ta baya, amma duk shekara ya kasa samun nasara. Ya yi rantsuwa cewa ba za a yi sulhu ba idan bai ci kyautar farko ba.
Yana da shekaru tamanin da biyu, a shekara ta biyu ta mulkin Yongxi na sarki Zhenzong na daular Song, ya samu lambar yabo ta farko.
聖意: Yi addu'a don tsaro na gida (mai kyau), amincin mutum, samun kuɗi, ciniki, aure, Liujia, masu tafiya maza, Chitian silkworms, maki takwas, dabbobi shida, neman mutane, ƙararrakin jama'a, ƙaura, asarar dukiya, cututtukan arewa maso yamma, amfanin kabari Fushan.
